latest_articles.summary: Ukrainian officials have accused Moscow of deliberately targeting energy infrastructure

latest_articles.title: Olympics Officials Signal Sanctions on Russia in Sports May End
latest_articles.summary: In Milan this week, Olympics officials signaled a willingness to ease years of restrictions imposed on the country over its state-backed doping program and invasion of Ukraine.

latest_articles.title: Ukrainian mother's joy after phone call with son she thought had been killed
latest_articles.summary: Nazar Daletskyi's family were sure he had been killed and had buried what they thought was his body in 2023.

latest_articles.title: Watch: Ukrainian soldier thought to be dead calls his family
latest_articles.summary: Nazar Daletskyi's relatives were told he had been killed in 2022, the first year of Russia’s full-scale invasion.
latest_articles.evidence: thought to be dead calls his family

latest_articles.title: Top Russian general shot in Moscow as talks stall on Ukraine ceasefire
latest_articles.summary: Lt. Gen. Vladimir Alekseyev, the deputy head of the GRU, Russia’s main foreign military intelligence agency, was targeted at his home in Moscow, officials said.

latest_articles.title: The Russian economy is finally stagnating. What does it mean for the war – and for Putin?

latest_articles.title: At Ukraine’s Request, Starlink Denies Internet Access to Russian Troops
latest_articles.summary: It’s unclear what effect the change will have on Russia’s ability to wage war, but Russian military bloggers said troops were experiencing internet outages that hampered frontline communications.

latest_articles.title: U.S., Russia to resume high-level military talks
latest_articles.summary: A U.S. official called the deal a by-product of ongoing efforts to end the Ukraine war. It came as a key nuclear treaty between Washington and Moscow expired.
latest_articles.evidence: ongoing efforts to end the Ukraine war

latest_articles.title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
latest_articles.summary: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.
latest_articles.evidence: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough

latest_articles.title: The Brief – Europe needs to get over its gas storage hysteria
latest_articles.summary: Apprehension about gas levels was justified in the immediate wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine. But fixating on plays into the hands of profiteers and fearmongers

latest_articles.title: US, Russia agree to reestablish high-level military-to-military dialogue
latest_articles.summary: The agreement to reestablish the military dialogue came after "productive and constructive progress" at Ukraine peace talks in Abu Dhabi
